summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Eighty-fifth Street; West Seventy-fifth Street, from Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest to Thirty-fourth Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6064, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
